item.title: Oracle 19c Installation on RHEL 7.9 🚀
item.description: Note: This Guide is Production Ready. Prerequisites # Install required X11 packages # Install X11 packages with following command based on your operating system release and version: yum install xorg-x11-xauth -y Configure X11 forwarding # To enable X11 Forwarding, change the “X11Forwarding” parameter using vi or nano editor to yes in the /etc/ssh/sshd_config file if either commented out or set to no.
